html.homecarosalHeader: Want to get rid of your pledge cans and bottles?
html.homecarosalContent: By using Gepant get individuals and organizations an opportunity to add to their finances and donors lose their cans and bottles, while contributing to a more environmentally friendly Sweden.
html.confirmNewDonation: Please look through the information below so everything is correct . Finish by checking the box below

navigation.collectPledge: Do you want to collect pledges ?

html.howWork: Gepant is a meeting place between those who want to pledge and those who want to receive pledges. The concept is that those who have cans and bottles, but are unable to recycle them can easily contact the organisations/individuals who signed up to receive pledges. Gepant enables organisations/individuals to earn more money, those who pledge will be free of their cans and bottles while Gepant contributes to a more environmentally friendly Sweden.
html.ifGepant: By using Gepant individuals and organisations are given the opportunity to add to their finances and donors the chance to get rid of their cans and bottles, while contributing to a more environmentally friendly Sweden.
html.press: The press material in style with stencils, high resolution images, contact details etc?
html.whyGive1: Every year 200 million cans / bottles in Sweden are thrown out that could have been recycled and reused. If you do not have the opportunity to recycle yourself, you can easily contact an organisation/individual who registered themselves to pick up pledges in your area. It takes less than 1 minute and you will then help to support an organisation/individual close to you while you are helping to contribute to a cleaner Sweden.
html.whyGive2: You can give a pledge IF you want to avoid managing all your empty cans and bottles while supporting local organisations / individuals who collect pledges for various purposes as you can see in the description of their purpose.
html.whoWe1: We are a couple of entrepreneurs who want to contribute to a more sustainable Sweden and simplify the way to support local organisations – by pledging cans and bottles so you don’t have to recycle them yourself.
html.wantToDonate1: Press the Gepant button, choose what you want to pledge, fill in your details and choose who you want to donate to.
html.wantToDonate3: Estimate how much you want to pledge
html.wantToDonate4: Select when the pledge can be picked up,
html.wantToDonate5: Choose who you want to donate to
html.wantToDonate6: Remember that you can also donate foreign and flattened cans to organisations that are part of Returpacks föreningskoncept.
html.collectPledge1: If you want to collect pledges to yourself or to an organization that you represent, you can
html.collectPledge3: It's completely free and you can get started right away.
html.collectPledge4: If you are an orgnisation or individual who wants to collect cans through our website please register and add a brief description of the purpose you are collecting pledges and why those who pledge should choose you.
html.collectPledge5: The better description of the project you are collecting pledges for, the greater is the chance that those who pledge will choose you.
html.collectPledge6: Also add if you can collect pledges containing foreign cans or not.
html.collectPledge7: Can you get money even for foreign cans - yes you can!
html.collectPledge8: Through cooperation with Returpack we can help you get compensation for both foreign and flattened cans.
html.collectPledge10: The entire offer is free of charge and Returpack also sponsors recycling bins made of corrugated board.
html.collectPledge12: You get a lump sum compensation per sack:
html.collectPledge16: SIGN UP as a client by calling or e-mailing Returpack customer-support;
html.collectPledge17: We will send you free bags and labels (for identification of your bags).
html.collectPledge18: You collect pledges and PUT PET-bottles in ONE bag and cans in another. Even flattened cans and jars without the pledge are permitted and will be compensated for.
html.collectPledge19: The bag / bags are then filed at any deposit destination.
html.collectPledge20: Returpack pays you for the bags, out to the bank account you have registered.
